definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The surface characteristics of wool and cashmere has been studied by SEM.
sentences.chinese: 本文用掃描電鏡研究了羊毛及山羊絨的表面特性。

sentences.english: It is the natural protection preferred by Piacenza Cashmere.
sentences.chinese: 該天然保護劑特別適用於皮亞琴查山羊絨。

sentences.english: The result shows that the quality of the yarn is satifactory for production of cashmere woolen blankets.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，成紗質量能符合生產山羊絨毛毯的要求。
